src_original: hetûpanibandhaḥ katamaḥ /
tgt_original: 其內緣從因義何也？

src_original: yad idam avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā yāvaj jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇam iti /  avidyā cen nâbhaviṣyan nâiva saṃskārāḥ prājñāsyanta /
tgt_original: 所言無明緣行、行緣識、識緣名色、名色緣六入、六入緣觸、觸緣受、受緣愛、愛緣取、取緣有、有緣生、生緣老死憂悲苦惱，次第增長。

src_original: evaṃ yāvad yadi jātir nâbhaviṣyan na jarāmaraṇaṃ prājñāsyata /  atha satyām avidyāyāṃ saṃskārāṇām abhinirvṛttir bhavati /  evaṃ yāvaj jātyāṃ satyāṃ jarāmaraṇasyâbhinirvṛttir bhavati /
tgt_original: 如是等苦陰聚集增長，如是有無明故行增長，如是乃至有生故老死增長。

src_original: tatrâvidyāyā nâivaṃ bhavati /  ahaṃ saṃskārān abhinirvartayāmîti /  saṃskārāṇām apy evaṃ na bhavati /  vayam avidyayâbhinirvṛttêti /  evaṃ yāvaj jātyā nâivaṃ bhavati /
tgt_original: 若無無明則不生行，若無生則無老死，如是有無明故有行增長，如是有生故有老死增長。

src_original: ahaṃ jarāmaraṇam abhinirvartayāmîti /  jarāmaraṇasyâpi nâivaṃ bhavati /  ahaṃ jātyā nirvṛttêti /  atha ca satyām avidyāyāṃ saṃskārāṇām abhinirvṛttir bhavati prādurbhāvaḥ /
tgt_original: 其無明亦不念言我能造行、行亦不念言我為無明所造，乃至生亦不言我能造老死、老死亦不言我為生所造。

src_original: evaṃ yāvaj jātyāṃ satyāṃ jarāmaraṇasyâbhinirvṛttir bhavati prādurbhāvaḥ //
tgt_original: 如是有無明故有行增長，乃至有生故有老死增長。

src_original: katam eṣāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāyāt /
tgt_original: 何者為六種性？

src_original: abdhātor nâivaṃ bhavati /  ahaṃ kāyasyânuparigrahakṛtyaṃ karomîti /
tgt_original: 水性亦能持能潤、能軟能濕。

src_original: tejodhāto-  [ Cambridge MS f101b ---> ]  r nâivaṃ bhavati /  ahaṃ kāyasyâśitapītakhāditaṃ paripācayāmîti /
tgt_original: 火性亦能持所飲噉食味、能令成熟。

src_original: vāyudhātor nâivaṃ bhavati /  ahaṃ kāyasyâśvāsapraśvāsakṛtyaṃ karomîti /
tgt_original: 風性亦能持歔吸噫氣喘息吐等。

src_original: ākāśadhātor nâivaṃ bhavati /  ahaṃ kāyasyântaḥ saurṣiryaṃ karomîti /
tgt_original: 此等四大所成，內孔即是空大，乃至成名色。

src_original: na câpy anyasya kasyacit /  evam abdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātur ākāśadhātur vijñānadhātur na satvo na jīvo na  jantur na manujo na mānavo na strī na pumān na napuṃsakaṃ na câhaṃ na mama na câpy anyasya kasyacit //  tatrâvidyā katamā /
tgt_original: 其地性非我、非眾生、非命、非男非女、非自非他，如是乃至識性。

src_original: yâiṣv eva ṣaṭsu dhātuṣv ekasaṃjñā piṇḍasaṃjñā nityasaṃjñā dhruvasaṃjñā śāśvatasaṃjñā sukhasaṃjñâtmasaṃjñā satvajīvamanujamānavasaṃjñā /  ahaṃkāramamakāra-  [ Bendall ed p222 ---> ]  saṃjñā /
tgt_original: 如是六性緣具故，有眾生想、常想恒想、有想、吾我想、婬欲想、我想。

src_original: evamādi vividham ajñānam iyam ucyate 'vidyêti /
tgt_original: 如是等類種種無知，稱為無明。

src_original: evam avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ viṣayeṣu rāgadveṣamohāḥ pravartante /
tgt_original: 有此無明故，於境則生愛著、則生瞋恚、則生癡。

src_original: tatra ye rāgadveṣamohā viṣayeṣv amī ucyante saṃskārêti /
tgt_original: 此等貪瞋癡依境故起，則稱為行。

src_original: vastuprativijñaptir vijñānaṃ /
tgt_original: 隨事分別，故名為識。

src_original: vijñānasahajāś catvāro 'rūpiṇôpādānaskandhās tan nāmarūpaṃ /  catvāri ca mahābhūtāni côpādāyôpādāya r ūpam aikadhyam abhisaṃkṣipya tan nāmarūpaṃ /
tgt_original: 從此識故復生四陰，即是名色。

src_original: nāmarūpasaṃniśritānîndriyāṇi ṣaḍāyatanaṃ /
tgt_original: 依名色故有諸根，以此稱為六入。

src_original: trayāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ /  sparśânubhavanā vedanā /  vedanâdhyavasānaṃ tṛṣṇā /  tṛṣṇā vaipulyam upādānaṃ /  upādānanirjātaṃ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma /  bhavaḥ /
tgt_original: 此聚集故有觸，覺觸故想，想後故愛，愛增廣故取，依取故生後有，業有生故有有，以業為因故有陰，陰起故生、陰熟故老、陰壞故死、內煩熱故憂、思想故悲、身識陰和會故苦。

src_original: skandhaparipāko jarā vināśo maraṇaṃ /  mriyamāṇasya mūḍhasya svâbhiṣvaṅgasyântardāhaḥ śokaḥ /  lālapyanaṃ paridevaḥ /  pañcavijñānakāyasaṃprayuktam aśātânubhavanaṃ duṣkhaṃ /
tgt_original: 其闇義故無明，其造作義故行，識義故識，堅立義故名色，入門義故六入，觸義故觸，領取義故受，愛取義故取，更生後有義故有，起義故生，熟義故老，壞義故死，煩熱義故憂，思想義故悲，逼惱身義故苦。

src_original: manasikārasaṃprayuktaṃ mānasaṃ duṣkhaṃ daurmanasyam /  ye cânyae evamādayôpakleśās tae upāyāsāḥ //
tgt_original: 逼惱心義故不適，隨煩惱分義故苦惱。

src_original: pe //  punar aparaṃ tatve 'pratipattiḥ mithyā pratipattiḥ ajñānam avidyā /  evam avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ-  trividhāḥ saṃskārāḥ abhinirvartante /  puṇyôpagâpuṇyôpagâniñjya-
tgt_original: 如是不隨實相故則隨邪行，無知故則無明，如是無明故生三種行，則是善、不善、無記。

src_original: puṇyôpagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ puṇyôpagam eva vijñānaṃ bhavati /  apuṇyôpagānāṃ saṃskārāṇām apuṇyôpagam eva vijñānaṃ bhavati /  āniñjyôpagānāṃ saṃskārāṇām āniñjyôpagam eva vijñānaṃ bhavati /  idam ucyate saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānam iti /
tgt_original: 有如是等行故，有善識、不善識、無記識，以是故行緣識。 以有善從識故則生，從善名色、不善及無記亦如是生，識緣故稱為名色。

src_original: evaṃ nāmarūpaṃ /  nāmarūpavivṛddhyā ṣaḍbhir āyatanadvāraiḥ kṛtyakriyāḥ pravartante /
tgt_original: 名色增長故，有六門作所應作等知智，名色緣故稱為六入。

src_original: tan nāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanam ity ucyate /  ṣaḍbhyâyatanebhyaḥ ṣaṭ sparśakāyāḥ pravartante 'yaṃ ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśêty ucyate /
tgt_original: 六觸入故生六觸，緣此六入故稱為觸。

src_original: yajjātīyaḥ sparśo bhavati tajjātīyā vedanā pravartate /  iyaṃ sparśapratyayā vedanêty ucyate /  yas tāṃ vedayati viśeṣeṇâsvādayati /  abhinandaty*adhyavasyaty atyadhitiṣṭhati /  sā vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇêty ucyate /  āsvādanâbhinandanâdhyavasānaṃ /
tgt_original: 此觸生故故生受，故稱緣觸生受，領取諸緣味著故名受。

src_original: mā me priyarūpaśātarūpair viyogo bhavatv iti /  aparityāgo bhūyo bhūyaś ca prārthanā /  idaṃ tṛṣṇāpratyayam upādānam ity ucyate /  evaṃ prārthayamānaḥ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma samutthāpayati kāyena vācā manasā /  ayam upādānapratyayo bhavêty ucyate /
tgt_original: 緣受故稱為愛，歡悅耽著好色染味名色不能捨離，深更貪求此等，稱為愛。 緣愛故取，欲更希求後有，因身口意業故，稱取緣有。

src_original: yā karmanirjātānāṃ skandhānām abhinirvṛttiḥ sā bhavapratyayā jātir ity ucyate /  yo jātyabhinirvṛttānāṃ skandhānām upacayaparipākād vināśo bhavati /  tad idaṃ-  [ Bendall ed p224 ---> ]  jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇam ucyate //
tgt_original: 依業故生陰，此是緣有故生。 此陰生起故有熟壞，故稱生緣老死。

src_original: pe //  evam ayaṃ dvādaśâṅgaḥ pratītyasamutpādo 'nyonyahetuko 'nyonyapratyayato /  nâivânityo na nityo /  na saṃskṛto nâsaṃskṛto /
tgt_original: 如是十二因緣生，更相因賴更相生長，無始輪轉無有斷絕。

src_original: na vedayitā /  na kṣayadharmo na nirodhadharmo /  na virāgadharmo /  anādikārapravṛtto 'nudbhinno 'nupravartate nadīsrotavat //  atha cêmāny asya dvādaśâṅgasya pratītyasamutpādasya catvāri aṅgāni saṃghātakriyāyai hetutvena pravartante /
tgt_original: 復次業及識等，次生十二因緣故生四支，此隨因義。

src_original: katamāni catvāri /
tgt_original: 何者為四？

src_original: avidyā tṛṣṇā karma vijñānaṃ ca /
tgt_original: 無明、愛、業、識也。

src_original: tatra vijñānaṃ bījasvabhāvatvena hetuḥ /  karma kṣetrasvabhāvatvena hetuḥ /  avidyā tṛṣṇā ca kleśasvabhāvatvena hetuḥ /
tgt_original: 其識種子有，為因其名色者，業及田為因，無明愛為煩惱因。

src_original: karmakleśā vijñānabījaṃ saṃjanayanti /  tatra karma vijñānabījasya kṣetrakāryaṃ karoti /
tgt_original: 無此業煩惱故，識種子不生長。

src_original: tṛṣṇā vijñānabījaṃ snehayati /  avidyā vijñānabījam avakirati /  asatāṃ yeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ bījasyâbhinirvṛttir na bhavati //  tatra karmaṇo nâivaṃ bhavati /  ahaṃ vijñānabījasya kṣetrakāryaṃ karomîti /
tgt_original: 則此因，業識種子為田，無明故散識種子，愛故潤識種子。

src_original: tṛṣṇāyâpi nâivaṃ bhavati /  ahaṃ vijñānabījaṃ snehayāmîti /  avidyāyâpi nâivaṃ bhavati /  ahaṃ vijñānabījam avakirāmîti /  vijñānabījasyâpi nâivaṃ bhavaty aham ebhiḥ pratyayair janitêti /
tgt_original: 其無明亦不生念言我能散識種子，愛亦不念言我能潤識種子，業亦不念言我於識為田用，識種子亦不念言我緣此等故生。

src_original: api tu vijñānabīje karmakṣetrapratiṣṭhite tṛṣṇāsnehâbhiṣyandite 'vidyâvakīrṇe  [ Cambridge MS f102b ---> ]  tatra tatrôtpattyāyatanasandhau mātuḥ kukṣau virohati /  rūpâṅkurasyâbhinirvṛttir bhavati /
tgt_original: 復次，識種子安住業田中，為愛所潤漬，無明為密覆，故種子生長，生名色芽於一切無生陰。

src_original: sa ca nāmarūpâṅkuro na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nôbhayakṛto nêśvarâdinirmito na kālapariṇāmito na câikakāraṇâdhīno nâpy ahetusamutpannaḥ /
tgt_original: 則此名色芽，亦非自造、亦非他造、亦非俱造、亦非自在天造、亦非無因生。

src_original: atha ca mātāpitṛsaṃyogād ṛtusamavāyād anyeṣāṃ ca pratyayānāṃ samavāyād āsvādânupraviddhaṃ vijñānabījaṃ mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpâṅkurabījam abhinirvartayati
tgt_original: 有如上業煩惱故，識種子增長生名色芽，亦不從此世度於後世而有，隨從業果因緣備足故。

src_original: āloko 'vabhāsakṛtyaṃ karoti /  ākāśam anāvaraṇakṛtyaṃ karoti /  tajjamanasikāraḥ samanvāhārakṛtyaṃ karoti /
tgt_original: 如是色為眼識緣境、明為開導、空為不礙，如是生意；

src_original: asatsv eṣu pratyayeṣu cakṣurvijñānaṃ nôtpadyate //
tgt_original: 無如是緣則識不生。

src_original: evaṃ rūpâlokâkāśatajjamanasikārāś câvikalā bhavanti /  tataḥ sarvasamavāyāc cakṣurvijñānasyôtpattir bhavati //
tgt_original: 如是眼、色、明、空、生意緣和合故生眼識。

src_original: tatra cakṣuṣo nâivaṃ bhavati /  ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyâśrayakṛtyaṃ karomîti /  rūpasyâpi nâivaṃ bhavati /  ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyârambaṇakṛtyaṃ karomîti /  ālokasyâpi nâivaṃ bhavati /
tgt_original: 則此眼亦不念言我能為眼識作依，色亦不念言我能為眼識作緣，境明亦不念言我為眼識作明導，空亦不念言我能為眼識作無礙，生意緣亦不念言我能為眼識作意緣。

src_original: aham avabhāsakṛtyaṃ karomîti /  ākāśasyâpi nâivaṃ bhavati /  ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyânāvaraṇakṛtyaṃ karomîti /  ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya samanvāhārakṛtyaṃ karomîti /  cakṣurvijñānasyâpi nâivaṃ bhavati /
tgt_original: 眼識亦不念言。

src_original: aham ebhiḥ pratyayair janitêti /
tgt_original: 我藉此等緣所生。

src_original: atha ca punaḥ satsv eṣu pratyayeṣu cakṣurvijñānasyôtpattir bhavati prādurbhāvaḥ /
tgt_original: 若有此緣則生眼識。

src_original: tan nâdhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pañcabhiḥ kāraṇair draṣṭavyaḥ //
tgt_original: 如是內因緣從緣義，應如是觀其內因緣義。

src_original: katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ /
tgt_original: 應作五事觀察。

src_original: na śāśvatato nôcchedato na saṃkrāntitaḥ /  parīttahetuno vipulaphalâbhinirvṛttitas tatsadṛśânuprabandhataś cêti //  kathaṃ na śāśvatataḥ /
tgt_original: 非常、非斷、非傳度、藉緣故果實增廣、從相似生。

src_original: api tu māraṇântikāś ca skandhā nirudhyante 'upapattyaṃśikāś ca prādurbhavanti /  tulādaṇḍônnāmâvanāmavat /  ato nôcchedataḥ //  kathaṃ na saṃtrāntitaḥ /
tgt_original: 即此時死陰滅故，更生餘陰中無間缺，如稱低起，故非斷。

src_original: visadṛśāt satvanikāyād dhi sabhāgāḥ skandhā jātyantare 'bhinirvartante /  ato na saṃkrāntitaḥ //
tgt_original: 以非相似故從初心更生勝心，故非傳度。

src_original: kathaṃ parīttahetuto vipulaphalâbhinirvṛttitaḥ parīttaṃ karma  [ Bendall ed p227 ---> ]  kriyate /  vipulaḥ phalavipāko 'nubhūyate /  ataḥ parīttahetuto vipulaphalâbhinivṛttiḥ //
tgt_original: 緣作小業受大果報，故稱藉緣故果實增廣。
